data.title: Saturday Cinema
data.meta_description: Exploring the best in film music, with host Lynne Warfel. Listen live at 10 a.m. central every Saturday on YourClassical Radio — now 2 hours!
data.text:
Films in the National Parks (and other lovely locations) with guest host Ward Jacobson

This week on Saturday Cinema, host Lynne Warfel plays two hours of listeners’ requests for their favorite film music, including selections from ‘How to Marry a Millionaire’ ‘Monsters, Inc.’ and ‘Julius Caesar.’ Listen now!

Send in your Saturday Cinema requests!

Lynne Warfel plays film music every Saturday morning on Saturday Cinema. Submit your requests to be considered for a future show.

Saturday Cinema Quiz: Film Noir

‘Saturday Cinema’ host Lynne Warfel has compiled this quiz to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the show. How well do you know film noir? See if you can match wits with Lynne!

August listener requests

This week on ‘Saturday Cinema,’ host Lynne Warfel plays two hours of listeners’ requests for their favorite film music, including selections from ‘How to Marry a Millionaire’ ‘Monsters, Inc.’ and ‘Julius Caesar.’ Listen now!

Saturday Cinema Quiz: Dress Right

‘Saturday Cinema’ host Lynne Warfel has compiled this quiz to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the show. How well do you know the magic behind costumes, props and wardrobes? See if you can match wits with Lynne!

Michael York

On the latest episode of ‘Saturday Cinema,’ it’s a celebration of Michael York! Host Lynne Warfel interviews York and features music from some of productions the productions he’s best known for, including ‘Cabaret,’ ‘The Taming of the Shrew’ and ‘The Four Musketeers.’ Listen now!

Saturday Cinema Quiz: Movie Critters

‘Saturday Cinema’ host Lynne Warfel has compiled this quiz to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the show. How well do you know the many critters of the movies? See if you can match wits with Lynne!

A musical treasure chest

On the latest episode of ‘Saturday Cinema,’ guest host Bonnie North hits the high seas with music from pirate films, including selections from ‘Pirates of the Caribbean,’ ‘Hook’ and ‘Captain Blood.’ Listen now to two hours of your favorite film music.

Saturday Cinema Quiz: 1940s Movies and Music

‘Saturday Cinema’ host Lynne Warfel has compiled this quiz to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the show. How well do you know 1940s movies and their music? See if you can match wits with Lynne!
